dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Hello there. I'm {npc.name} the wizard. I'm currently studying the abandoned mine north of here.

dialog.name: tellmore
dialog.message: It's an abandoned dwarven mine that makes some sort of a tunnel between several locations. Rumor is that a portal to the legendary Moroch Temple is located there, which is what I'm trying to find out about.
If you are also interested in the mine, you can read about it in my notes in the bookcase.
